Reviews.Title: Decent for the price
Reviews.Author: Richard Diaz
Reviews.Content: Good purchase, great for travel, super lightweight and the controls are very user-friendly. Battery lasts a long time and you can easily download photos to your PC without installing the included software.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera pixels, zoom, and size for the $price!
Reviews.Author: KaylaS
Reviews.Content: It was a very nice camera for the $70 I spent on it. It has pretty good pixels, zoom, and is very small (great for your pocket or for a very small handbag). It did worry me however, how light it was. But I am not so worried now, because I even bought the 3 year (Accidental Drop/Handling) Warranty and am very glad I did...it seems pretty truthful and helpful! As for why I bought this camera... I already have a very nice Kodak M580 (even with 8x zoom and 14 mp) but it is very unreliable because it freezes up when I need a picture most. The Kodak, is also very heavy and large. So I decided to buy this small, compact, good camera on Black Friday (for a like $15 discount). I think its pretty great. The buttons are positioned in good places, except for the flash, which you have to get to on the menu (making it a little more difficult for quick snap-shots).

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Bumble
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my mom to replace her old and slow camera. It is awesome!! The Magic mode is so much fun! I'm kind of jealous, now I want one... It slim, sleek, fast, and just what I was looking for! The colors great too!

Reviews.Title: VG - BG
Reviews.Author: A. Tay "Private Tay"
Reviews.Content: I've got too many cameras - Nikon d700, d80, SONY NEX, Olympus XZ1. When I read a magazine review, I was for some reason intrigued by this. Then I saw it was on offer. And got it. I love the size. The VG 20, 130 and 140 have more features but is a lot bigger. I like that it's small but not too small. The Minox is darn hard to use, especially the shutter release. This one, I like a lot. Hold it correctly, vertically between first finger and thumb and you can even sneak shots without composing at 27mm. Some reviewer say it's smaller than a pack of cards, maybe so, but I'm trying to fit it into a ciggie box. The VG110 is Bloody Good.

Reviews.Title: Such a great camera for an awesome deal!
Reviews.Author: KDubs322
Reviews.Content: My previous camera was an Olympus so I wanted to keep it in the family. With minimal time and money, this was my first option as a replacement. I love this camera! It's so lightweight and small and can easily fit in your pocket. Has a lot of cool effects that are easy to navigate: face detection, fish eye lense, negative effect and the coolest of them all.. the panoramic option! Pictures come out crisp and clear with the awesome 12mp. Charges quickly. Just overall a great camera for a great price. Note: I was bummed to find out that this did NOT come with an SD card, so you'll have to buy that separately!

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Shalom
Reviews.Content: This is a great compact camera. I wanted a camera that I can put it in my pocket to carry around everywhere. As far as I know it is one of the smallest and lightest cameras. It also takes really good and sharp pics. It even takes nice and sharp pics indoor. I recommend this for those who are looking for a compact camera.

Reviews.Title: Great inexpensive camera
Reviews.Author: armed guard
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use on patrols incase of incident that needs photo documentation. THe zoom does not go extremely far but the wide angle makes up for that. The 12 mp resolution does a nice job with details.Down side it feels very light and not very tough sounds like cheap internal workings and the auto flash seems to like to go off even in sunlight. Still tho very nice cheap camera worth the money for a first timers camera.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Debbie
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera. Great for the money. Nice small size to fit in my purse or pocket. I also bought the card and case in a bundle to go along with it.

Reviews.Title: Happy with Delivery
Reviews.Author: Timothy Norton "tnorton32"
Reviews.Content: The product arrived in good time... no problem. Just an observation... it doesn't seem to be built real well, no fault of the seller.

Reviews.Title: I bought the second one.....but it also broke very quickly - maybe I do something really wrong with them :)))
Reviews.Author: Anatoliy Solnyshkin "anatoly"
Reviews.Content: I just took pictures with it, honestly, and downloaded them on my computer, never claimed any insurance as I bought it in US and now in Canada.......it just lost its focus one day and I got really disappointed. But it did serve me well for a while :)

Reviews.Title: Olympus VG-110 12 MP Digital Camera with 4x Wide Zoom Lens (27mm) and...
Reviews.Author: Carlos Novoa "Fernando Novoa"
Reviews.Content: Elegant, beautiful. This product offer good advantages to low price. It quality is good and I recommend the product. . .

Reviews.Title: Not great
Reviews.Author: rachelrawr
Reviews.Content: Pretty much takes pictures and that's about all.  If you want something on par with you cell phone that takes terrible pictures that are blurry than this is the camera for you (especially in the event that you have over imbibed in an alcoholic beverage or two).

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: nestor pereira
Reviews.Content: rapido y seguro el servicio me gusto el producto porque era justo lo que vi es justo lo que me llego

Reviews.Title: A dreadful camera
Reviews.Author: the unknown editor
Reviews.Content: This camera (the d700 variant of it) seems good to begin with, but after a few months without having been dropped, scratched or damaged physically in any way, and of having been in a soft case for most of the time, despite a change of batteries and of SD card, it just mysteriously stopped working.I just turned it on one day, and the lens came out as normal, went back in again, went out, went in, etc. until eventually, the camera made a few beeping noises.It does this every time I turn it on, and as a result, I am taking it back to the shop where I bought it.If that's the kind of quality that they are built yo, to break for no obvious reason after jut a few months, I would strongly advise against anyone even considering to buy this item. :((although 'magic' mode is fun to use :)

Reviews.Title: A camera that can't last summer heat.
Reviews.Author: mycosy2k
Reviews.Content: I dont usually waste my time writing reviews but this item is so bad that i am.  I've had 2 cameras over the last year or so.  Samsung TL series which i washed it in the washing machine for a whole cycle.  I left it to dry (using the whole rice in ziploc technique) and it worked without a flaw.  I buy this camera to back up just incase my samsung dies, and i left it in the car for couple days and it started to break down so i sent it for warranty repair.  Supposely the camera suffered a corrosion damage due to liquid.  I used this camera twice and left it in my car for couple days.  I guess its my fault for giving the camera too much "liquid or humidity" to handle.Since when does humidity provide more liquid than a whole cycle worth of water in the washing machine.Think before you buy.  Obviously I chose the wrong brand and hope you dont.End.

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Will Barton "will barton"
Reviews.Content: IT WIRKS BUT PHOTOS ARE BLURY, NOT VERY GREAT WITH COLOR, BUT YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR I GUESS.

ProductInfo.Features:
12 MP Camera
4x Wide Zoom Lens (27mm)
2.7" LCD
SDHC Compatible
AVI Movie with Sound
12 megapixels (effective), 1/2.3 inch image sensor; 4x wide-angle optical zoom plus 4x digital zoom
2.7 inch LCD monitor; CCD Contrast Detection; AVI movie with sound
Magic Filter still and movie; Panorama mode
Digital image stabilization; Intelligent Auto; AF Tracking; Face Detection
USB 2.0 High-Speed; SD/SDHC compatible (card not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus VG-110  12 MP Digital Camera with 4x Wide Zoom Lens (27mm) and 2.7-Inch LCD (Red)
